messages.title: Shortest NHS Waiting Lists in recorded history
messages.content: If you need one good reason to vote Labour

keyPolicies.policyDescription: My political experience gives you a strong voice in parliament
I will campaign to bring employment opportunities to our area
I will campaign for excellence in the NHS and all our public services
My constituency office will be responsive to those seeking my help

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Respect the public trust placed in an MP
keyPolicies.policyDescription: An independent approach and probity in MP's allowances

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron has promised to scrap Labour's Cancer pledge

issues.education: Capital investment in schools risen from £5.2m in 1997 to £23.3m 2010. Record rise in exam results. 770 more teachers, teaching assistants and support staff.
issues.health: Record investment in health. NHS waiting times at lowest. Labour's Cancer pledge.
issues.socialWelfare: Child Tax and Working Families Tax Credit paid to 10,200 families. Maternity pay doubled, Family allowance increased from £11 in 1997 to £20 now. Winter fuel allowance to 14,410 households. Free eye tests to 1,198 pensioners, 9,600 free TV licences, 750 recipients of pension credit.

politicalExperience.achievements: Delivered record investment in schools and health.

contactInformation.address: Room A, 1a Highfield Road, Hemsworth, WF9 4DP

endorsements.endorsement: I couldn’t have managed without the help of Jon Trickett and his office.

images.caption: Labour's local achievements for families and pensioners
